titleStmt.title: An answer to a scandalous paper of T. Hicks, term'd A rebuke to T.R. &c. with a reassumption our former complaint and charge against T. Hicks / by a lover of truth, Thomas Rudyard.
titleStmt.author: Rudyard, Thomas, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
